titleStmt.title: Henry the Second, King of England, with the death of Rosamond a tragedy, acted at the Theatre-Royal, by Their Majesties servants.
titleStmt.author: Bancroft, John, d. 1696.
Mountfort, William, 1664?-1692.

notesStmt.note: Variously ascribed to William Mountfort and John Bancroft. Cf. BM (New ed.) ; DNB and Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
